property.name: appliedAlternateLayout
property.shortdesc: The alternate layout section to which the page belongs.

property.name: side
property.shortdesc: The side of the binding spine on which to place the page within the spread.

property.name: appliedSection
property.shortdesc: The section to which the page belongs.

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the Page within its containing object.

property.name: documentOffset
property.shortdesc: The sequential number of the page within the document.

property.name: bounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the Page, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2].

property.name: masterPageItems
property.shortdesc: The items on a specified document page that originated on the applied master page and have not been overridden or detached. Can return: Array of PageItems, Guides, Graphics, Movies or Sounds.

property.name: allPageItems
property.shortdesc: Lists all page items contained by the Page.

property.name: allGraphics
property.shortdesc: Lists all graphics contained by the Page.

property.name: gridData
property.shortdesc: Default grid properties. Note: Applies to named, layout, and frame &#40;story) grids.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the Page.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the Page &#40;a Spread or MasterSpread).

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container &#40;such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

property.name: optionalPage
property.shortdesc: optional page for HTML5 pagination. Obsolete after CS6

property.name: appliedTrapPreset
property.shortdesc: The trap preset applied to the page. Can also accept: String.

property.name: pageColor
property.shortdesc: The color label of the Page, specified either as  an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator or PageColorOptions enumerator.

property.name: appliedMaster
property.shortdesc: The master spread applied to the Page. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: masterPageTransform
property.shortdesc: The transform applied to the master page before it is applied to Page.

property.name: tabOrder
property.shortdesc: The order in which the focus moves to different form fields in the PDF when the tab key is pressed. Can return: Array of Buttons, CheckBoxes, ComboBoxes, ListBoxes, RadioButtons, TextBoxes or SignatureFields.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: placeXML
method.shortdesc: Places the XML element onto a page. If the place point is above an existing page item, place the XML element into the page item.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The XML element to place.

parameter.name: placePoint
parameter.shortdesc: The point at which to place the object, specified in the format [x, y].

parameter.name: autoflowing
parameter.shortdesc: If true, autoflows placed text. &#40;Optional)

method.name: setContent
method.shortdesc: Replaces the content of XML element with content imported from a file.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The file path to the import file.

parameter.name: relativeBasePath
parameter.shortdesc: Base path used to resolve relative paths. &#40;Optional)

method.name: snapshotCurrentLayout
method.shortdesc: Create a snapshot of the layout for the current Page size and shape.

method.name: deleteLayoutSnapshot
method.shortdesc: Delete the snapshot of the layout for the current Page size and shape.

method.name: deleteAllLayoutSnapshots
method.shortdesc: Delete all layout snapshots for this Page.

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the page.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The new location of the page relative to the reference object or within the document or spread.  &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter value specifies before or after. Can accept: Page or Spread. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: binding
parameter.shortdesc: The location of the binding spine in spreads. &#40;Optional)

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the Page.

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicates the page.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location at which to place the duplicate page relative to the reference object or within the document or spread.  &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to value specifies before or after. Can accept: Page or Spread. &#40;Optional)

method.name: placeAndLink
method.shortdesc: Deprecated: Use contentPlace method. Original Description: Create a linked story and place it into the target.

parameter.name: parentStory
parameter.shortdesc: The story to place and link from.

parameter.name: placePoint
parameter.shortdesc: The point at which to place &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: destinationLayer
parameter.shortdesc: The layer on which to place &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to display the link options dialog &#40;Optional)

method.name: place
method.shortdesc: Places the file.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.shortdesc: The file to place

parameter.name: placePoint
parameter.shortdesc: The point at which to place &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: destinationLayer
parameter.shortdesc: The layer on which to place &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to display the import options dialog &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: autoflowing
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to autoflow placed text &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the placed object&#40;s) (Optional)

method.name: removeOverride
method.shortdesc: Removes the override from a previously overridden master page item.

method.name: detach
method.shortdesc: Detaches an overridden master page item from the master page.

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameter.name: existingSelection
parameter.shortdesc: The selection status of the Page in relation to previously selected objects. &#40;Optional)

method.name: transform
method.shortdesc: Transform the page item.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The temporary origin during the transformation. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameter.name: withMatrix
parameter.shortdesc: Transform matrix. Can accept: Array of 6 Reals or TransformationMatrix.

parameter.name: replacingCurrent
parameter.shortdesc: Transform components to consider; providing this optional parameter causes the target's existing transform components to be replaced with new values.  Without this parameter, the given matrix is concatenated onto the target's existing transform combining the effect of the two. Can accept: MatrixContent enumerator, Array of MatrixContent enumerators or Long Integer. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameter.shortdesc: If true then a ruler based origin is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. &#40;Optional)

method.name: reframe
method.shortdesc: Move the bounding box of the page item

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameter.name: opposingCorners
parameter.shortdesc: Opposing corners of new bounding box in the given coordinate space

method.name: resize
method.shortdesc: Resize the page item.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The bounding box to resize. Can accept: CoordinateSpaces enumerator, BoundingBoxLimits enumerator or Ordered array containing coordinateSpace:CoordinateSpaces enumerator, boundsKind:BoundingBoxLimits enumerator.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The transform origin. Legal specifications: relative to bounding box: anchor | {anchor | {x,y}, bounds kind [, coordinate space]}; relative to coordinate space: {x,y} | {{x,y}[, coordinate space]}; relative to layout window ruler: {{x,y}, page index | bounds kind}. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameter.name: by
parameter.shortdesc: How the current dimensions are affected by the given values

parameter.name: values
parameter.shortdesc: The width and height values. Legal dimensions specifications: {x, y [, coordinate space]}, {x, resize constraint [, coordinate space]}, or {resize constraint, y [, coordinate space]}; where x and y are real numbers and coordinate space is used to determine _only_ the unit of length for x and y; coordinate space is ignored for the 'current dimensions times' resize method&#41;. Can accept: Array of Reals, ResizeConstraints enumerators or CoordinateSpaces enumerators.

parameter.name: resizeIndividually
parameter.shortdesc: If false and multiple page items are targeted, the new dimensions are attained only by moving the individual items rather than resizing them. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameter.shortdesc: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. &#40;Optional)

method.name: transformValuesOf
method.shortdesc: Get the transformation values of the page item.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use

method.name: resolve
method.shortdesc: Get the coordinates of the given location in the specified coordinate system.

parameter.name: location
parameter.shortdesc: The location requested. Can accept: Array of 2 Reals, AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of Arrays of 2 Reals, CoordinateSpaces enumerators, AnchorPoint enumerators, BoundingBoxLimits enumerators or Long Integers.

parameter.name: in
parameter.shortdesc: The coordinate space to use.

parameter.name: consideringRulerUnits
parameter.shortdesc: If true then a ruler location is interpreted using ruler units rather than points. The default value is false. This parameter has no effect unless the reference point is specified relative to a page. &#40;Optional)

method.name: contentPlace
method.shortdesc: Duplicate an object and place it into the target.

parameter.name: pageItems
parameter.shortdesc: One or more page items to place or load

parameter.name: linkPageItems
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to link pageItems in content placer &#40;if true it will override link stories value) (Optional)

parameter.name: linkStories
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to link stories in content placer &#40;only applicable for single story, pageItem links will also be created in case of more than one item) (Optional)

parameter.name: mapStyles
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to map styles in content placer &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: placePoint
parameter.shortdesc: The point at which to place &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: destinationLayer
parameter.shortdesc: The layer on which to place &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: Whether to display the link options dialog &#40;Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The key.

parameter.name: value
parameter.shortdesc: The value.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

parameter.name: key
parameter.shortdesc: The key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Page.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)
